no.ntnu.imt3281.movieExplorer

Class InformationDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.imt3281.movieExplorer.InformationDB

  • public class InformationDB
extends java.lang.Object
    GenresDB is the database controller for the Genres DB. This db contains registered genres from themoviedb The code is mostly refactored from the lectures and project 2 in this subject
